generated_text:
- sidewalk: The image shows a paved pedestrian area with bollards, benches, and people walking, which is characteristic of a sidewalk.
- building: The image features tall structures with windows and commercial signage, which are clearly buildings.
- vegetation: There are numerous trees lining the sidewalk and street, which fall under vegetation.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows a bright, open sky with some clouds.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking or sitting on benches along the sidewalk.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the left side of the image, and another is parked on the right side.
- car: A white car is parked on the left side of the image, and another car is visible further down the street.
- truck: A yellow truck is partially visible on the right side of the image, parked near a building.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the left side of the image, mounted on a pole.
- pole: Multiple vertical poles (bollards) are present along both sides of the sidewalk, and a traffic sign pole is also visible.
- traffic light: There is no visible traffic light in the image.
